column5: When you come back out and see this, I surmise the person must have failed colouring within the lines 101 and paid off the driving instructor.Â Â  I would hazard a guess Cracker Jack doesn't issue licences anymore.Â Â  Hopefully the goalie had to go for a #2 so they could score.

Speaking of "roundabouts"... My wife and I were in Paris France and had hired a cab to take us to the airport. Our hotel was just outside of the Louvre, near the 12 lane roundabout. We get in the cab, it's a mini-van. It's also a standard. So we head to the roundabout, it's packed with cars, hardly moving. Our driver is chatting on his cell phone, smoking a ciggy and drinking a coffee all the while driving us! I look out the side window of the van, we are so close to the car next to us, I was sure you wouldn't be able to slip a sheet of paper between the two. I said to the driver, "you guys must excellent drivers to able to negotiate this kind of traffic". His response, "we killed all the bad drivers here!" I lol and just looked at the floor of the van...Â  it was too much for this guy to watch! HH

I grew up navigating the one at the QEW and 20 Highway in Hamilton going back and forth to U of T,Â  I believe we had another on the QE in Niagara Falls back then getting off to go to the Rainbow Bridge.
